meanings.definition: To intend or plan to do something.
meanings.sent1: I gunnen to finish my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She gunnen to visit her grandmother next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to gunnen to catch the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The team gunnen to win the championship this year.
meanings.sent5: He gunnen to learn how to play the guitar like a pro.

meanings.definition: To give permission or allow something to happen.
meanings.sent1: Mom gunnen me to stay up late on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gunnen the students to work in groups for the project.
meanings.sent3: The rain clouds gunnen the sun to shine through for a moment.
meanings.sent4: The locked door finally gunnen entry to the curious cat.
meanings.sent5: The park sign gunnen visitors to bring their pets on leashes.
